quest.name: Surprise Offerings
journal:
Seigetsu the Enlightened would entrust you with a matter of some secrecy.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

You have spoken with the Namazu procurer.
Deliver the requested supplies to Seigetsu the Enlightened.
objectives: Synthesize [Error]Deliver [Error] to Seigetsu the EnlightenedMine [Error] in the east of Mol IlohGather [Error] in the east of Mol IlohCatch [Error] at Azim Khaat.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Forename, I have a special favor to ask of you. Our altar has frequent need of fresh offerings─fish, fruit, and the like─and we require your assistance in procuring replacements. But these must be no ordinary offerings...

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Our head procurer will provide you with the details of your task─you will find him absorbed in his work near the Path of the Craven. ...Oh, and Forename? Pray keep this request confidential, if you would.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03120
dialogue.text: Seigetsu sent you, yes, yes? Thank the Big One! I need an expert─a veteran in the field─to handle one of the more challenging aspects of the procurement.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03120
dialogue.text: To be more specific, I need you to craft a high-quality metal fish sculpture for our altar offerings. As convincingly real as possible! Feel free to raid my supply crate for anything you need.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03120
dialogue.text: To be more specific, I need you to craft a high-quality imitation flower for our altar offerings. As convincingly real as possible! Feel free to raid my supply crate for anything you need.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03120
dialogue.text: To be more specific, I need you to craft a high-quality hot pepper ball. As excruciatingly spicy as possible! Feel free to raid my supply crate for anything you need.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03120
dialogue.text: To be more specific, I need you to mine some pieces of jade that could be mistaken for kusamochi─you know those green-colored rice cake treats? The all-knowing Seigetsu mentioned deposits are to be found to the east of Mol Iloh.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03120
dialogue.text: To be more specific, I need you to harvest some wild steppe radishes─I hear they feel like hot coals on your tongue. According to Seigetsu and his infallible research, such peppery vegetables can be found growing in the east of Mol Iloh.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03120
dialogue.text: To be more specific, I need you to locate some salmon roe and use it to catch me a spikefish from the waters of Azim Khaat. They say the locals usually cut this one free, seeing as it's more bone than fish...

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03120
dialogue.text: Once you have my request in order, please deliver it straight to Dhoro Iloh. I'll bring the rest to Seigetsu myself...if I ever manage to find everything on this infernal list.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03120
dialogue.text: As I said, feel free to raid my supply crate there if you find yourself lacking any materials. Pillage away!

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03120
dialogue.text: Once you have those jade pieces, I'd appreciate it if you could take them directly to Seigetsu. Yes, yes.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03120
dialogue.text: Once you have those steppe radishes, I'd appreciate it if you could take them directly to Seigetsu. Yes, yes.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03120
dialogue.text: Once you've caught that spikefish, I'd appreciate it if you could take it directly to Seigetsu. Yes, yes.

dialogue.name: DAILYNAMAZUO03120
dialogue.text: All set? Let's get our offerings to Seigetsu, and remember: not a word to anyone! No, no!

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: You have my “special consignment”?

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Most excellent. You see, there is a reason we have needed to replace our altar offerings with such frequency. Shall I enlighten you as to why?

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Thieves. A certain number of ill-natured and gluttonous Namazu have been stuffing their faces with our festival fare.

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: Thus did I requisition the creation of such offerings that would fill the bellies of these voracious vandals with naught but remorse. A civilized solution, do you not agree?

dialogue.name: KOFUINSEIGETSU
dialogue.text: But even the average Namazu is unrepentant in his appetite! No matter how many are repulsed by our culinary artifice, there will always be another tempted by the prospect of a surreptitious snack! We must stand ready to restock our supply...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
